snippet: Oklahoma City Thunder point guard Russell Westbrook will miss the first four to six weeks of the N.B.A. season after having arthroscopic surgery on his right knee.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder point guard Russell Westbrook will miss first four to six weeks of NBA season following arthroscopic surgery on his right knee.
lead_paragraph: Oklahoma City Thunder point guard Russell Westbrook will miss the first four to six weeks of the N.B.A. season after having arthroscopic surgery on his right knee.
